name: Hero's Harem Guild
description:
In Hero's Harem Guild you're a simple poor guy who becomes a community hero for surviving a powerful demon attack.

You'll lead a Guild full of beautiful adventurers willing to work, train and fight for you. Upgrade the Guild, repair the town, seek new members, build relationships with those that already are and complete quests in this RPG-themed world to unlock fully animated and uncensored lewd scenes. This first version comes with 160 animations, over 1300 images, and events for the first 6 girls! And there's a LOT more to come.

PATREON DISCORD FUTURE PLANS FOR THE GAME
 In the upcoming next out-of-alpha update (v0.1.0)

This is all I want to do:

  • Re-do some scripts. To make it easy for me.
  • Re-do the game logo...
  • Add all 14 girls to the plot. With their events, scenes, quests, and story. (The game will have more girls than 14.)
  • Re-insert Elizabeth, Ari, and Leticia
  • Re-make Leticia.
  • A real inventory system.
  • A real market.
  • Re-design the quest window. (Title, descriptions, etc.)
  • Re-made from scratch the contracts.
  • Add weekend events and rainy days!
  • Make RPG-Like player jobs!
  • Interactive NPC's
  • Training girls system.
  • Change notifications to POP-UPS
  • First 6 girls to level 10. The others 9 to level 5.
  • Nerf the events. (In v0.0.1, the girl's events are "from the future". I want the player to see at least 5 or 6 story events BEFORE being able to unlock the lewd scenes/events.)
  • If patreon is doing good, hire an artist to change the GUI entirely.

This is all what I want to do for v0.1.0. If something is left at the moment of the update, it will be added eventually.

To keep track of the next big update, join the DISCORD.  There's a channel where you can see which of these ideas I'm working on. And in which I already finished.
